synopsis.native: Un recorrido por la cara oculta de la historia de los Estudios Balcázar (aka Esplugas City), unos de los más prolíficos en rodajes de westerns durante casi una década.
synopsis.english: Fifty years have gone by since the golden age of Spaghetti Westerns, a unique film genre that re-imagined the American Far West. Today few remember the Balcázar Studios in Barcelona (Spain), one of the most productive of this genre for almost a decade. Except some survivors, those responsible for a type of cinema that no longer exists, who insist on sharing their fascinating story.
